name: Aerospace & Defense Systems Manufacturing Inc.
description: Aerospace & Defense Systems Manufacturing Inc. (AFSM) is a leading manufacturer and integrator of advanced aerospace and defense systems. Founded in 1995, AFSM specializes in the design, development, and production of high-precision components and systems for military and commercial aviation applications. With a strong commitment to innovation and quality, the company serves a diverse clientele, including government contractors, commercial airlines, and international defense organizations. AFSM’s product offerings include avionics, flight control systems, and advanced materials that enhance the performance and safety of aircraft. The company is also at the forefront of developing next-generation technologies, including unmanned aerial systems (UAS) and smart weaponry. With multiple manufacturing facilities strategically located across the United States, AFSM is equipped to meet both domestic and global demands, ensuring timely delivery and superior service. The company’s mission is to provide cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of the aerospace and defense sectors while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and excellence. AFSM is committed to sustainability and actively seeks ways to reduce its environmental impact through innovative manufacturing processes and materials.

faq.answer: AFSM specializes in the manufacturing of advanced aerospace and defense systems.

faq.answer: Jane Doe is the CEO of Aerospace & Defense Systems Manufacturing Inc.

faq.question: Where is AFSM headquartered?
faq.answer: AFSM is headquartered in Huntsville, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: What are AFSM's main products?
faq.answer: AFSM's main products include avionics, flight control systems, and unmanned aerial systems.
